Hetu
Kusalattika, Kilesagocchaka
Kusalattika, Kilesasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
20.
1483Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkiliṭṭhadukasadisaṃ.)
